original_text: And he could do no mighty work there, except that he laid his hands on a few sick people and healed them.
korean_text: 거기서는 아무 권능도 행하실 수 없어 다만 소수의 병자에게 안수하여 고치실 뿐이었고

sentences.original_text: And he could do no mighty work there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그곳에서 큰 일을 행하실 수 없었습니다.

sentences.original_text: except that he laid his hands on a few sick people
